name: Teddius Legacy
description:
You like Teddy Bears ? Wait what, you prefer video games ? Everyone says so nowadays ... but who is thinking about the pretty little toys children used to play with ?

Listen, Teddius is enraged and ready to fight right now. Come and together destroy evil video games robots in a side-scroller shooter. Disarm your ennemies to get big gun, grab them with your glue gun and use them as a shield, or simply destroy them all !

You're gonna love it as much as Teddius

Made by: 

- Arnaud Cerisey : Lead developer

- Idris Piers : Producer & Unity Integrator

- Audrey Ferrandez : Lead Graphist & Animator

- Aurélien Fontaine : Game Designer

- Quentin Romand : Game Designer 

- Adrien Jen : Developer

- Aymeric Mullot : Game Designer

- Sébastien Rioux : Graphist 

- Mattias Roudot : Developer

- Pauline Roy : Graphist & Animator 

- Maxime Blandin : Music & Sound Design 

- Manasseh Rakotoasimbola : Concept Artist
